clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mkst.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mkstemp
Warn when ‘mkstemp’ is passed fewer than 6 X’s in the format string.
The
clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mkstemp
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mkst.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
